summary: Adds a medium-sized defensible stronghold to the tundra of whiterun for the dragonborn to claim as his/her own.
descriptionHtml:
----------------------
Introduction
----------------------
Adds a medium-sized defensible stronghold to the tundra of whiterun for the dragonborn to claim as his/her own.

----------------------
What you get
----------------------
A brutal good looking home in the tundra complete with a drawbridge, three watchtowers, many sharpened sticks, a house, a smithy and a dirtcellar for storage. Also contains all crafting stations.
The stronghold contains lots of weapon displays, bookshelves and non-respawning containers all placed in an immersive manner. No perfect rows of identical chests here (I hate those). The stronghold is fully navmeshed and companion-friendly, just dont tell your companion to wait outside the walls, raise the drawbridge and call on him/her. He/she might die if you do so. Because under the drawbridge is a hole with sharp pointy sticks. Beware.

PS: You have to kill a paranoid bandit chief who lives in the stronghold...

----------------------
Requirements
----------------------
Latest skyrim patch.

----------------------
Recommended mods
----------------------
To enhance your experiance with homes in skyrim i recommend the following mods:
Unlimited bookshelves http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10891
Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652

For those of you who want guards and more bedrolls at the stronghold i can recommend using the following mods:
My Home Is Your Home - a mod for followers http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045
Althirs Camping Tools - Portable Fire and Tent http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10824

----------------------
Installation
----------------------
Use NMM , Easiest way.
Or you can do it the old school way by extracting the 7z in your data folder and tick the HSFStockade.esp in your Skyrim launcher.

----------------------
Special thanks
----------------------
Eldiabs for Modders Resource-Weapon Racks-Bookshelves-Plaques-Mannequins.
This guy saved me hours of work!
author: HSF

files.name: Warchif Stronghold
files.changelogHtml:
Added small windshelter for 3 followers next to the house.
Added a haypile for followers to sleep in.
Added invisible furniture markers that sandbox followers will use.
Edited the navmesh a tiny bit.

files.name: Warchief Songhold
files.changelogHtml:
Added stable with its own exit.
Changed the look of the dagger rack in entrance to the house.
Added \"Dragon furniture\", dragons will now land on the stronghold.
Added dragon landingspots outside the stronghold preventing them from landing inside.
Edited the navmesh a bit.

files.name: Warchief Stronghold
files.changelogHtml:
Bed now gives the Well Rested bonus.
Added 2 new dagger racks.
Added a journal with a little backstory.
Fixed some Z-fighting.

files.name: Warchief Stronghold 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Major changes to main living area, most are cosmetical.
Many bug fixes.
Retextured weapon wall racks to better fit the stronghold.
Added a new room to the dirtcellar with a khajiit smuggler.
Sorry for the long delay in between updates. Real life came at me hard and took all my time to upload this, hope you enjoy it!
